thread.title: Convenient Location near St Pancris/Kings Cross
thread.title_full: Convenient Location near St Pancris/Kings Cross - Review of Alhambra Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: CaliTexan22
title: Convenient Location near St Pancris/Kings Cross
text:
We booked this hotel for its convenient location coming and going through the train stations. The rooms are very small and noisy, but clean and otherwise suitable for what they purport to be. We were at #22 across the street and down some very narrow stairs.
We checked some bags while spending a couple of days in Paris. We were warned not to leave anything valuable in the bags, and I did remove electronics, etc. However, on return, I found my duffle bag had been unzipped and a pair of prescription glasses was missing. I'm not sure what else might have fallen out / been taken. I've emailed the hotel asking for them to search the luggage storage room, so fingers crossed that they will turn up.
Room Tip: ask about location of your room for train rumbling and street noise See more room tips
